mapper.sql: BATCH_NO, UPLOAD_PATH, UPLOAD_NAME, RESULT_PATH, RESULT_NAME, UPLOAD_TIME, UPLOAD_USER, STATUS, NOTE, MONTH
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from PMS_PROFIT_LOG
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into PMS_PROFIT_LOG (BATCH_NO, UPLOAD_PATH, UPLOAD_NAME, RESULT_PATH, RESULT_NAME, UPLOAD_TIME, UPLOAD_USER, STATUS, NOTE, MONTH) values (#{batchNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{uploadPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{uploadName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{resultPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{resultName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{uploadTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{uploadUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{month,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

BATCH_NO,
UPLOAD_PATH,

mapper.update:
update PMS_PROFIT_LOG
UPLOAD_PATH = #{uploadPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPLOAD_NAME = #{uploadName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RESULT_PATH = #{resultPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RESULT_NAME = #{resultName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPLOAD_TIME = #{uploadTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPLOAD_USER = #{uploadUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NOTE = #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MONTH = #{month,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where BATCH_NO = #{batchNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update PMS_PROFIT_LOG set UPLOAD_PATH = #{uploadPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPLOAD_NAME = #{uploadName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RESULT_PATH = #{resultPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RESULT_NAME = #{resultName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPLOAD_TIME = #{uploadTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPLOAD_USER = #{uploadUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NOTE = #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MONTH = #{month,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where BATCH_NO = #{batchNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

mapper.select: select aa.ID,aa.AG_NAME,bb.BUS_PLATFORM,cc.PLATFORM_NAME from A_AGENT aa,A_AGENT_BUSINFO bb,A_PLATFORM cc where aa.ID = bb.AGENT_ID and bb.BUS_PLATFORM = cc.PLATFORM_NUM and aa.ID='${agentId}' and bb.BUS_PLATFORM='${busCode}'
select aa.NAME,aa.LOGIN_NAME from C_USER aa where aa.ID ='${userId}'
